channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251229)
item.description:
What's New

Improve event handling, spell check, and app behavior detection

  • Fixed XKeyIM pre-load library
  • Optimized for Claude Code CLI
  • Fixed spell check restore when typing after existing text
  • Improved event handling and injection methods
  • Enhanced app behavior detection
  • Added advanced injection methods for better compatibility

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
